post.title: any disadvantage in getting the iphone4 first and then negotiating a hup with rogers?
post.content: any disadvantage in getting the iphone4 first and then negotiating a hup with rogers? i want the dust to settle and ensure i actually get an iphone first before negotiating the 3 year deal. currently i'm in year 2 of a 3 year deal for my bb 8900. thoughts?
